pin.title: Cast Your Vote
pin.subtitle: Enter your credentials to begin voting
pin.notEligible: You are not eligible to vote at this time

ballot.title: Your Ballot
ballot.subtitle: Select one candidate for each position
ballot.selectAll: Please select a candidate for every position

review.title: Review Your Selections
review.subtitle: Please verify your choices before submitting
review.warning: Your vote will be recorded on the blockchain and cannot be altered. You may cast a new vote to supersede this one.
review.error: Failed to submit your vote. Please try again.

receipt.title: Vote Submitted Successfully!
receipt.subtitle: Your vote has been securely recorded
receipt.autoLogout: You will be logged out in {seconds} seconds
receipt.keepSafe: Keep this receipt number safe. You can use it to verify your vote.

pinReset.title: Request PIN Reset
pinReset.subtitle: Enter your National ID to request a PIN reset. You will then choose how to verify your identity.
pinReset.error: Failed to submit PIN reset request. Please try again.
pinReset.statusPending: Your PIN reset request is pending. Complete verification via biometric or visit an IEBC office.
pinReset.statusApproved: Your PIN has been reset. You can now log in with your new PIN.
pinReset.statusNone: No pending PIN reset request found for this ID.
pinReset.chooseMethodSubtitle: Your reset request has been submitted. Choose how you would like to verify your identity.
pinReset.biometricDesc: Re-verify by scanning your national ID and completing a liveness check using your camera. Powered by Persona.
pinReset.inPersonDesc: Visit your nearest IEBC office to verify your identity in person.
pinReset.inPersonStep1: Bring your original national ID card
pinReset.inPersonStep2: An IEBC officer will verify your identity
pinReset.inPersonStep3: You will receive your new PIN on the spot

register.title: Register to Vote
register.subtitle: Register your national ID to participate in the election
register.distressPinNote: Use your Distress PIN only if you are being coerced to vote against your will. Keep both PINs safe and secret.
register.personaDesc: Verify your identity in minutes using your camera and national ID. Powered by Persona.
register.personaInProgress: Verification in progress — you will be notified when complete.
register.manualDesc: Schedule an appointment at your nearest IEBC office to verify your identity in person.

appointment.noSlots: No slots available this week. Contact your IEBC office.
appointment.bringId: Please bring your original National ID card to your appointment.
appointment.pinResetNote: Your PIN will be reset at your appointment by an IEBC officer.

verify.title: Verify Your Vote
verify.subtitle: Enter your receipt serial number to confirm your vote was recorded correctly
verify.label: Receipt Serial Number

result.verifiedDesc: Your vote has been cryptographically verified and the record is intact.
result.integrityDesc: The vote data integrity check failed. Please contact the IEBC immediately.
result.supersededDesc: This vote was replaced by a newer vote. Only the most recent vote counts.

values.hashInvalid: Invalid — data may have been altered

verify.secrecyNote: This verification confirms your vote was recorded correctly, but does not reveal how you voted. Ballot secrecy is maintained at all times.

errors.notFound: No vote found with this serial number. Please check the number and try again.
errors.generic: Verification failed. Please try again later.
errors.invalidFormat: Serial number must be exactly 16 hexadecimal characters (0–9, A–F).
